calloutBox.title: Enthusiastic Elephants
calloutBox.subTitle: 24 months to 27 months
calloutBox.content: Our Enthusiastic Elephants program includes 12 toddlers ranging from approximately 24 months to approximately 27 months old.  Three consistent and nurturing staff are caring for our toddlers daily.

mainContent.title: Program Details
mainContent.content: During their time in the Enthusiastic Elephants classroom, your child will experience a morning circle time, small group activities centered around art, colors/shapes, texture table time, and an outdoor recess. Before leaving our Elephants class, we would like the children to have a solid foundation of colors and shapes. Each child in our Elephants classroom is taking one nap a day, enjoying our nutritional menu, and is learning to use utensils. Each child will be given an opportunity to be introduced to (or continue to work on) potty training as well.
list: Personal cot and storage area provided
Parents provide an extra set of clothes, crib sheet, and diapers/pull-ups
Special art and various age development projects
Bi-weekly Bible stories and prayers before each meal
Nutritious breakfast, lunch, and snack provided

boxes.title: Ms. Marge - Lead Teacher
boxes.text: I have 7 siblings, 40+ nieces and nephews, and 40+ great nieces and nephews. I have a Bachelorâ€™s Degree from Western University and an Elementary Education Degree from Calvin. In my free time, I knit, crochet, and cross stitch. The best part of my day is taking care of your children.

boxes.title: Ms. Mikayla
boxes.text: I have a son named Kole and he is my whole world. Together, we love being outside fishing on our boat and going to the park. I am going to school to become a registered nurse in pediatrics or cardiology. I have worked at Big steps since 2016 and have enjoyed watching the children learn and grow.

boxes.title: Ms. Brandi
boxes.text: I graduated from Lowell High School, where I met my husband, Justin, and we have been married since 2016. I have 3 dogs named; Bentley, Buddy, and Evee. I am attending Aquinas College in the Education department. I have a large family with 12 siblings and I love spending time with them on any occasion.
